Will Reliance Jio also have an NBFC to supplement its payments bank ops? It is loghical to think so, says H Srikrishnan of Jio Payments Bank. @TamalBandyo #BSBankingForum

Mobile penetration for commercial banks is still in a single digit. Mobile banking is also abysmally low. That's where we are different, says H Srikrishnan of Jio Payments Bank. @TamalBandyo #BSBankingForum

MyJio is no longer just a telco app. It is in fact the most-downloaded OTT pack. People watch TV, listen to music, and they can also bank, says H Srikrishnan of Jio Payments Bank. @TamalBandyo #BSBankingForum

What can Jio Payments do that banks cannot? We have a network of Reliance Jio stores. We are reaching 370 mn customers. Not we can add value by offering them financial products, says H Srikrishnan of Jio Payments Bank. @Tamalbandyo #BSBankingForum

Retail business today is so that 80% of the transaction is still via cash. Wallet is not a solution, says H Srikrishnan of Jio Payments Bank. @TamalBandyo
 #BSBankingForum

The model that digital wallets were following was driven by incentives offered to customers. They came for those incentives. The model is not sutainable, says H Srikrishnan of Jio Payments Bank. @TamalBandyo #BSBankingForum

There is nothing that we or any other payments company is doing outside of the regulatory realm. We are chasing transactions, not deposits, says H Srikrishnan of Jio Payments Bank. @TamalBandyo #BSBankingForum

The fundamental premise for payments bank in 2016 was that telco KYC could be used. In 2018, it was reversed. So, onboarding of customers was a challenge. We had to go back to the drawing board many times, says H Srikrishnan of Jio Payments Bank. @TamalBandyo #BSBankingForum
